ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates usage of VerticalSliceModifier for getting slices of series like when using RolloverModifier. You can add, remove and interact with slices
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates usage of [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#VerticalSliceModifier.html']VerticalSliceModifier[/url] for getting slices of series like when using RolloverModifier.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
[i]You can add and remove slices on chart. Also you can click on vertical slice and drag it to change point of slice.[/i]
